definition: to wave/to brandish/to command/to conduct/to scatter/to disperse
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: A spendthrift does not like being a spendthrift.
sentences.chinese: 揮霍無度的人也不喜歡成爲敗家子。

sentences.english: Despite this, he was so extravagant that he was always in debt.
sentences.chinese: 儘管收入不少，但他揮霍無度，經常債臺高築。

sentences.english: Her spending without restraint ran him heavily in debt.
sentences.chinese: 她的揮霍無度使他負債累累。

sentences.english: Or are they just kneeling at the feet of our wisdom of profligacy?
sentences.chinese: 還是說他們根本就只能匍匐於我們的揮霍無度？

sentences.english: The giant stars, spendthrifts, were gone long ago, back in the dimmest of the dim far past.
sentences.chinese: 那些揮霍無度的巨星早已消失在了黯淡遙遠的過去。

sentences.english: The giant stars, spendthrifts, were gone long ago, back in the dimmest of the dim far past.
sentences.chinese: 那些揮霍無度的巨星早已消失在了遙遠的昏暗的過去。

sentences.english: Spendthrifts, however, don't necessarily have the moral high ground.
sentences.chinese: 然而，揮霍無度的人卻並不必然能夠佔據道德制高點。

definition: attempting nothing and accomplishing nothing (idiom); without any initiative or drive/feckless
the fabled roc flies ten thousand miles (idiom)/one's future prospects are brilliant
lit. to rein in the horse at the edge of the precipice (idiom)/fig. to act in the nick of time
to be without a fixed residence (idiom)
mountain and river exhausted (idiom); at the end of the line/nowhere to go
drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
sighing voice, wailing breath (idiom)/to heave deep sighs/to sigh in despair
the return of a prodigal son (idiom)
